abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: Boosts Fire moves 	if hit by one.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when 	hit by Dark moves.

faithfulAbilities.name: Flash Fire
faithfulAbilities.description: Boosts Fire moves 	if hit by one.

faithfulAbilities.name: Justified
faithfulAbilities.description: Boosts Attack when 	hit by Dark moves.

tmHmMoves.name: Curse
tmHmMoves.description: Works differently 	for Ghost-types.

tmHmMoves.name: Roar
tmHmMoves.description: Scares wild foes 	to end battle.

tmHmMoves.name: Toxic
tmHmMoves.description: A Poison move with 	increasing damage.

tmHmMoves.name: Hidden Power
tmHmMoves.description: The type varies 	with the #mon.

tmHmMoves.name: Sunny Day
tmHmMoves.description: Boosts Fire-type 	moves for 5 turns.

tmHmMoves.name: Protect
tmHmMoves.description: Foils attack that 	turn. It may fail.

tmHmMoves.name: Safeguard
tmHmMoves.description: Prevents all 	status problems.

tmHmMoves.name: Iron Tail
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	lower Defense.

tmHmMoves.name: Return
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that is 	based on loyalty.

tmHmMoves.name: Dig
tmHmMoves.description: 1st turn: Burrow 	2nd turn: Attack

tmHmMoves.name: Rock Smash
tmHmMoves.description: Removes Reflect 	and Light Screen.

tmHmMoves.name: Double Team
tmHmMoves.description: Raises the user's 	evasiveness.

tmHmMoves.name: Fire Blast
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	inflict a burn.

tmHmMoves.name: Swift
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that 	never misses.

tmHmMoves.name: Aerial Ace
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that 	never misses.

tmHmMoves.name: Substitute
tmHmMoves.description: Makes a decoy with 	1/4 user's max HP.

tmHmMoves.name: Facade
tmHmMoves.description: Double damage with 	Psn, Brn, or Prz.

tmHmMoves.name: Flame Charge
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	up user's Speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Rest
tmHmMoves.description: Sleep for 2 turns 	to fully recover.

tmHmMoves.name: Attract
tmHmMoves.description: Makes the opposite 	gender infatuated.

tmHmMoves.name: Thief
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	steal a held item.

tmHmMoves.name: Wild Charge
tmHmMoves.description: A charge that also 	hurts the user.

tmHmMoves.name: Strength
tmHmMoves.description: A powerful physi- 	cal attack.

tmHmMoves.name: Agility
tmHmMoves.description: Sharply raises the 	user's Speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Body Slam
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	cause paralysis.

tmHmMoves.name: Charm
tmHmMoves.description: Sharply lowers the 	foe's Attack.

tmHmMoves.name: Double Edge
tmHmMoves.description: A tackle that also 	hurts the user.

tmHmMoves.name: Endure
tmHmMoves.description: Endures any hit 	with at least 1HP.

tmHmMoves.name: Headbutt
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	cause flinching.

tmHmMoves.name: Sleep Talk
tmHmMoves.description: Randomly attacks 	while asleep.

tmHmMoves.name: Swagger
tmHmMoves.description: Causes confusion 	but raises Attack.

default.description: It controls a big territory. If it detects an unknown smell, it roars loudly to force out the intruder.

Hisuian.description: They patrol their territory in pairs. Their fur has igneous rock components from volcanic activity.
